title: IReplaceFaceFeatureData.IGetFacesForReplacement
description: Gets the faces to replace in this feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of faces to replace of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IReplaceFaceFeatureData::GetFacesForReplacementCount
before calling this method to get the value for Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
